xwikidoc.title: Wiki Scores
xwikidoc.content:
== Welcome to Wiki Scores ==
You'll find the latests sports scores on this Wiki. This Wiki has been created to work with the [[Mycroft Sports Skill>>url:https://github.com/ldubost/sports-skill]] by extracting sports scores from the great Wikipedia.
This would not be possible without the amazing Wikipedia community who is updating Wikipedia pages very quickly as games are finished. Kudos to Wikipedia.
== View Sports results ==
* [[Tennis>>Sports.Tennis]] currently only Roland Garros Men & Women * [[Volley-Ball>>Sports.Volley-Ball]] currently only the Volley Ball Nations League Men * Feminin Football World Cup 2019
== Query Sports Results ==
You can try the following queries:
* nadal for Roland Garros Men * halep for Roland Garros Women * FRA for Volley-Ball * FRA for Football Worldcup
{{include document="Sports.Code.Query" /}}
=== Source & Licence ===
The source of this content is from Wikipedia pages. All the content on this Wiki is licenced under the ODBL.
